name: Mating Battle Pose
statusText: The Lizard Girl's strange poses have weakened your strength.
outcome: [AttackerName] strikes a mighty pose while riding on [TargetName]'s face, and [TargetName] buries [TargetHisOrHer] face deeper into [AttackerName]'s pussy to hide their embarrassment.
miss: [AttackerName] tries to strike a battle pose while riding [TargetName]'s face, but can't keep her balance on the adventurer's head.
statusOutcome: [TargetName] is embarrassed by the pose performed by [AttackerName], and [TargetHisOrHer] power has fallen.
statusMiss: [TargetName] manages to not lose strength out of embarrassment.
